nayem.csevu@gmail.com: Bangladesh is a South Asian country located on the Bay of Bengal and bordered by India to the west, north, and east, and Myanmar to the southeast. It is known for its lush greenery and many waterways, including the Padma, Meghna, and Jamuna rivers. The capital city is Dhaka, which is the political, economic, and cultural center of the country.
